content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) - Currently has 49 iron ore and is full of coal.
- Furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) - Currently empty with no resources.
- Furnace (position (4.0, 0.0)) - Currently empty with no resources.
- Furnace (position (6.0, 0.0)) - Currently empty with no resources.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (0, 0) is full and cannot accept more coal.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Repeated errors
- The error regarding inserting coal into the furnace at position (0, 0) has occurred multiple times. Always check the inventory status of the furnace before attempting to insert items.
